risk_captures.project_name: Kontra Bantuan Penyediaan Jasa Tenaga Ahli GKAO
Pelaksanaan Assessment NOT Berdasarkan Hasil Study F-DZ/MPT/PAUS TANP Assessment Air Tenaga Ahli Regulatory Risk dan pengembangan
risk_captures.overall_comment: Assessment komprehensif dengan strategi mitigasi yang tepat untuk regulatory risk management

risk_captures.project_name: Kontrak Bantuan Penyediaan Tenaga Ahli Regulasi dan Non-Regulasi dengan Payroll System untuk POLAPLAN
KONTRAK BANTUAN PENYEDIAAN JASA TENAGA AHLI OPERASI DAN MAINTENANCE FASILITAS SURFACE
risk_captures.overall_comment: Beberapa risiko tinggi memerlukan kontrol mitigasi tambahan, terutama terkait K3 dan operasional fasilitas surface

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kebocoran data operasional dan informasi sensitif proyek GKAO akibat cyberattack atau insider threat
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Akses sistem yang tidak terkontrol, vulnerability pada aplikasi, social engineering attacks
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Kehilangan kepercayaan klien, reputasi perusahaan menurun, potential legal liability dari regulator
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Kerugian finansial hingga 5 miliar rupiah, biaya recovery dan legal fees 2 miliar rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Multi-factor authentication, VPN access, regular security audit, employee security training

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Key person tenaga ahli GKAO meninggalkan proyek di tengah masa kontrak kritical
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Kompetisi pasar talent, kurangnya employee retention program, work-life balance issues
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Delay project deliverable, knowledge loss, penurunan kualitas output operasional
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Delay 2-4 bulan dengan cost impact 1.2 miliar rupiah untuk replacement recruitment dan training
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Retention bonus program, knowledge documentation, succession planning, competitive compensation

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Output tenaga ahli GKAO tidak memenuhi standar kualitas yang ditetapkan klien
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Kurangnya quality control, mismatch skill requirement, insufficient supervision
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Client dissatisfaction, rework requirement, reputational damage untuk future contracts
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Rework cost 800 juta rupiah, potential penalty 500 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Quality assurance process, regular client feedback, milestone reviews, performance monitoring

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Pelanggaran regulasi ketenagakerjaan atau compliance requirement dalam penyediaan tenaga ahli
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Perubahan regulasi, incomplete documentation, non-compliance dengan labor law
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Sanksi regulatori, legal liability, suspension dari future tenders
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Regulatory fine hingga 1 miliar rupiah, legal cost 300 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Legal compliance review, proper documentation, regular audit, HR policy adherence

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Assessment NOT tidak memenuhi standar regulatory compliance atau audit requirement
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Changing regulation, complexity dalam interpretation requirement, methodology gaps
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Sanksi regulatori, repeat assessment requirement, credibility loss
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Regulatory fine hingga 15 miliar rupiah, re-assessment cost 3 miliar rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Regular compliance review, methodology validation, expert consultation, documentation standard
risk_items.verifier_comment: Comprehensive compliance framework properly addresses regulatory requirements

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Keterlambatan completion assessment akibat koordinasi yang tidak optimal antar stakeholder
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Tight schedule, dependency pada multiple parties, communication gap, resource constraints
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Delay project completion, client dissatisfaction, impact pada credibility future projects
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Penalty delay hingga 500 juta rupiah, opportunity cost dari late delivery
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Project management tools, regular stakeholder meeting, clear communication protocol, buffer time

risk_items.taksonomi: Teknologi & Keamanan Siber - Infrastruktur dan Sistem
risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kegagalan integrasi payroll system dengan existing HR system atau data corruption
risk_items.sumber_risiko: System incompatibility, data migration issues, lack of proper integration testing
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Payroll disruption, employee dissatisfaction, administrative burden, operational inefficiency
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: System recovery cost 800 juta rupiah, manual process overhead 200 juta rupiah per bulan
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Comprehensive system testing, data backup, phased implementation, dedicated IT support

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Ketidaksesuaian kebijakan kompensasi antara tenaga ahli regulasi dan non-regulasi menimbulkan konflik
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Lack of standardized compensation policy, different skill requirements, market rate variations
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Employee conflict, unfair treatment perception, potential legal dispute, morale issues
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Legal settlement cost hingga 1 miliar rupiah, turnover cost 500 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Clear compensation framework, transparent grading system, HR policy documentation, regular review

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Kecelakaan kerja serius saat operasi maintenance fasilitas surface production dengan risk tinggi
risk_items.sumber_risiko: High-risk working environment, equipment failure potential, human error, environmental hazard
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Worker injury/fatality, operational downtime, regulatory scrutiny, reputational damage
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Medical cost dan compensation hingga 5 miliar rupiah, production loss 10 miliar rupiah per hari
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Comprehensive safety training, proper PPE, regular equipment maintenance, safety officer supervision, emergency response
risk_items.verifier_comment: Need enhanced safety monitoring and real-time hazard detection system

risk_items.peristiwa_risiko: Fluktuasi nilai tukar rupiah mempengaruhi cost struktur project yang menggunakan equipment import
risk_items.sumber_risiko: Global economic uncertainty, inflation pressure, currency volatility, geopolitical factors
risk_items.dampak_kualitatif: Budget overrun, margin compression, potential contract renegotiation dengan client
risk_items.dampak_kuantitatif: Additional cost hingga 800 juta rupiah untuk currency impact, hedging cost 100 juta rupiah
risk_items.kontrol_eksisting: Currency hedging strategy, regular budget monitoring, price escalation clause in contract, forward contracts
risk_items.verifier_comment: Currency hedge strategy adequately addresses exchange rate risk
